T02TD2394E:23a-1: dh'a tur p'a da n'a ma /
T02TD2394E:23a-3: gser 'gyur gyi rtsi zhes bya ba /
T02TD2394E:23a-4: yum rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2394E:23a-5: sbyin pa'i pha rol rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2394E:23a-6: gser 'gyur rtsi yi gdams pa ni //
T02TD2394E:23a-7: nyams su len pa'i gang zag la //
T02TD2394E:23a-8: tshogs ni bsag phyir bshad par bya //
T02TD2394E:23a-9: bal po se'u sman tshe dang //
T02TD2394E:23a-10: sa 'u ra bsre ka ka si sa //
T02TD2394E:23a-11: chang skyur dang ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2394E:23a-12: zangs kyi snod du zhag gsum bzhag / de nas bdun gsum nyi shu gcig / zhal gyi gdams pa'i sman rtsi yis //
T02TD2394E:23a-13: srab mo'i lcags rnams zangs su 'gyur //
T02TD2394E:23a-14: dngul chu dang ni khams dang //
T02TD2394E:23a-15: sen rtsi dang ni lci ba ni //
T02TD2394E:23a-16: sde gur byas nas de yi dbus //
T02TD2394E:23a-17: zangs dmar bzhag na dngul du 'gyur //
T02TD2394E:23a-18: rta rmig dang ni lug ru dang //
T02TD2394E:23a-19: rus sbal shun spangs shi la ra bcas //
T02TD2394E:23a-20: bzhus pa'i gser la dngul btab nas //
T02TD2394E:23a-21: de rnams bsdus pa'i cha brgyad kyis //
T02TD2394E:23a-22: bzhus pa'i zha nye btab byas nas //
T02TD2394E:23a-23: zla ba lngar ni dngul 'gyur ro //
T02TD2394E:23a-24: dngul dang khar ba mnyam byas nas //
T02TD2394E:23a-25: zha nye'i tshad du bsre bar bya //
T02TD2394E:23a-26: phyi lta'i snod kyi nang du ni //
T02TD2394E:23a-27: zhu bas thams cad dngul du 'gyur //
T02TD2394E:23a-28: sha chen srang ni brgyad dang ni //
T02TD2394E:23a-29: zha nye dkar po de dang mnyam //
T02TD2394E:23b-0: sa dz'i srang @23b gnyis sman tsha dang //
T02TD2394E:23b-1: dug srang gcig dang dngul chu mnyam //
T02TD2394E:23b-2: gangs can sman ni khu ba yis //
T02TD2394E:23b-3: snga ma'i sman rnams mnye bar bya //
T02TD2394E:23b-4: thams cad rva dkar nang du bcug / yang na rdza sa'i snod du ni //
T02TD2394E:23b-5: kha sbyor byas nas bsreg par bya //
T02TD2394E:23b-6: sman thal bar du bzhag nas bton //
T02TD2394E:23b-7: dngul ni zla ltar grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2394E:23b-8: skyes pa tsam gyis she'u yi //
T02TD2394E:23b-9: bu ri sha na blang byas nas //
T02TD2394E:23b-10: nyi ma zhu nas btab par bya //
T02TD2394E:23b-11: de ni bzhi 'gyur phye yis ni //
T02TD2394E:23b-12: zha nye dkar po'i zhun mar la //
T02TD2394E:23b-13: btab nas chu skams dngul du 'gyur //
T02TD2394E:23b-14: sman tsha dang ni tsha la dang /
T02TD2394E:23b-15: ya baksha ra sa rdzi ka / rtsi dkar sman ni khu ba dang //
T02TD2394E:23b-16: dug dang ha nu ma sha ti'i //
T02TD2394E:23b-17: chu ni ma he'i zho dang sbyar //
T02TD2394E:23b-18: zhag gsum zha nye'i nang du bzhag / du ba mi 'byung thabs kyis bsreg / dngul 'gyur phongs pa'i sdug bsngal sel //
T02TD2394E:23b-19: dngul 'gyur sbyor pa bshad byas nas //
T02TD2394E:23b-20: gser 'gyur bdud rtsi bshad par bya //
T02TD2394E:23b-21: gangs can ri bo rnams la ni //
T02TD2394E:23b-22: ro dan ti zhes sman mchog grags //
T02TD2394E:23b-23: lo mas sa phyogs zil mi bral //
T02TD2394E:23b-24: gser gyi mdog can khu ba 'dzag / zha nye dkar po dngul chu ldan //
T02TD2394E:23b-25: thal sbyor zhal gyi gdams pa yis //
T02TD2394E:23b-26: reg pas dngul zangs gser du 'gyur //
T02TD2394E:23b-27: dang po me yis dngul chu yi //
T02TD2394E:23b-28: mi 'chor ba yi sbyor ba bya //
T02TD2394E:23b-29: de nas sman gyi rtsi shes nas //
T02TD2394E:23b-31: mi dang lhan cig ma gnas na //
T02TD2394E:23b-33: de'i phyir kha sbyor 'khor lo yis //
T02TD2394E:23b-34: ci nas dngul chu bcing bar bya //
T02TD2394E:23b-35: de bcings gang yang gser du 'gyur //
T02TD2394E:23b-36: zos pas thams cad rdo rje'i sku ru 'gyur //
T02TD2394E:23b-37: gser 'gyur rtsi'i gdams pa slob dpon na lis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
